text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump... you’ve been WRONG alot... hell you were even impeached! (lest we forget!)

You & Jared were both WRONG about covid19 being a “hoax”

You were WRONG about the scale and cause to worry...

Don’t you think you could also very well be WRONG about lifting lockdowns so soon!?
